title: Vol. 2, No. 9 Joseph F. Quin
summary: The newsletter discusses legal procedures for surplus property disposal in fire departments, emphasizing the absence of applicable statutes and providing guidelines based on analogous laws. It also addresses potential liability issues and recommendations for fire departments to properly dispose of surplus property.
compressed_content: 1. Surplus property disposal procedures for fire departments are discussed. 2. No applicable statute is found in Washington state, but guidelines based on analogous laws are provided. 3. Potential liability issues arise from surplus property sales and dispositions. 4. Recommendations include reviewing surplus property guidelines and consulting legal counsel. 5. Proper documentation of surplus property disposition is emphasized to avoid liability.
